word: H7827 - שְׁחֵלֶת - shᵉchêleth - shekh-ay'-leth - Onycha - ஒனிக்கா

sections.paragraph: onycha; an ingredient used in the holy incense
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Apparently from the same as H7826 through some obscure idea, perhaps that of peeling off by concussion of sound; a scale or shell, that is, the aromatic mussel: - onycha.
Cognate: H7826, H7827
